name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of robust experience in developing high-performance applications, proficient in **Golang**, **AWS**, **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, **AI**, and building **Microservices** and **CI/CD** pipelines. Expert in **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, leveraging **TypeScript**, **React**, and backend technologies like **Node.js** and **Django** to deliver responsive and scalable applications. 
Adept at implementing real-time monitoring and performance solutions utilizing **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **Datadog**, and **New Relic** for system health insights. Skilled in integrating advanced AI solutions using **OpenAI**, **LangChain**, and **Hugging Face** to enhance application capabilities.
Proficient in deploying applications in cloud environments while ensuring compliance with industry standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong technical foundation in MLOps, with extensive experience in model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
